Text:
This movie is supposed to be in Spanish.  But in the description is claims it is English audio, and at the top of the page is says Spanish.  

What's the deal?  Is it dubbed?  Does it have subs?

Audio: Spanish
English subs at the link above.

Thanks for the info on the language ztorrenter.

And just a heads up, there is no subs available for this movie (yet).

Go here: http://www.brrip.net/3443-extraterrestre-2011-720p-bluray-x264-dts-mysilu-brripnet.html 

Under the descriptions you will find a link to the subs, try it, i think it's pretty accurate.
